testimonials.text: She is quick to pick up any new technologies whether for design of buildings and the occupied space or for developing in javascript or C# - it is awesome to see the results come to fruition.
I thoroughly enjoyed my time working with Heather and would consider her as a truly valuable asset to absolutely any team.
